column1: 38898779$Colossal Fighter/Assault Mode$Unlimited$DARK$[Warrior/Effect]$$$$$10$3300$1500$$$$This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except with "Assault Mode Activate". When this card is Special Summoned
column2: you can send up to 2 Warrior-Type monsters from your Deck to the Graveyard. All monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK for every Warrior-Type monster in your Graveyard. When this card on the field is destroyed
column3: you can Special Summon 1 "Colossal Fighter" from your Graveyard.$Warrior/Colossal Fighter/Assault Mode Activate$$Sends from your Deck to your Graveyard$Summon/Trigger/Continuous$
